item.title: Database Resurrection - Reviving vPostgres DB on VMware vCenter Server
item.author: Robert Guske
item.description: Power Failure causes Problems again Once in a while power failures happens and can (mostly will!) cause troubles for small homelabs like mine at home. I’m running a two-node vSAN cluster on two Supermicro SYS-E200-8D servers. My vSAN Witness Appliance is running on a small Intel NUC, which is perfectly suited for this use case. My vCenter Server is (still) running on the vSAN cluster but only compute-wise. I have a Synology NAS runing as well which is providing an additional NFS datastore in order to at least have the VCSA storage outsourced from the cluster.
